titles.title: International Fund for Israeli-Palestinian Peace Authorization Act of 2014
To seek the establishment of and contributions to an International Fund for Israeli-Palestinian Peace.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary:
12/4/2014--Introduced. International Fund for Israeli-Palestinian Peace Authorization Act of 2014 - Urges the President to make every effort, in conjunction with the government of Israel, the Palestinian Authority, and the international community to establish an International Fund for Israeli-Palestinian Peace.
Authorizes appropriations for U.S. contributions to the Fund.
